name: Snake plunge
description:
A short game about going down a caves as a snake.

This was supposed to be a a mini-jam-103-darkness. But i was to late at making it, but since the ideas seems fun i keep making it

Controls:

  • Press right mouse button to go forward
  • R to respawn to the nearest respawn point

Tips:

  • If you got stuck try to wiggle around. I don't know why this works but hey snake do snakes thing
